data.message: I used to get excited for Christmas when I saw your advert every year it told me Xmas was coming....  Now it's been the same advert for so long I look for sainsburys advert.  It's sad as I remember as a kid my parents used to gather us all for the  adverts for days waiting for yours then when we saw it we would decorate!  I always promised I would do that with my children and now when your adverts on I change the channel 😥😥😥
